postReview.title: Leicester City 0-3 Wolves: Cunha on target as Pereira makes blistering start
postReview.description: Vitor Pereira could not have asked for a better start to life at Wolves, who scored three goals without reply at the King Power Stadium.

preReview.title: The next game will be huge for Leicester according to Van Nistelrooy
preReview.description: Leicester meet fellow strugglers Wolves on Sunday, with the latter likely to be sporting a new head coach in Vitor Pereira.

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sun, 22 Dec 2024 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Wolverhampton Wanderers won 3–0 over Leicester City on Sun, 22 Dec 2024 14:00:00 GMT.
